feed.title: Google Cloud: Container Optimized OS

entry.title: Changed
entry.content: Upgraded google-guest-agent to 20250327.00. This included new services like `google-guest-compat-manager.service` and `google-guest-agent-manager.service` and new binaries like `google_guest_compat_manager`, `gce_metadata_script_runner`, `google_guest_agent_manager`, `ggactl_plugin_cleanup` and `gce_compat_metadata_script_runner`.

entry.title: Changed
entry.content: Updated the Linux kernel to v6.6.92.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: Injected IMEX channel char device for GB200 GPUs.

entry.title: Fixed
entry.content: Updated cos-gpu-installer to v2.5.2: Added support for OTHER/NO\_GPU cases to enable GPU driver preloading on the ARM64 architecture and added support for IMEX Driver configuration installation for NVIDIA\_GB200 machine.

entry.title: Security
entry.content: Upgraded net-misc/curl to version 8.12.1. This fixes CVE-2025-0167.

entry.title: Security
entry.content: Fixed KCTF-3f98113 in the Linux kernel.

entry.title: Changed
entry.content:
Runtime sysctl changes:
* Changed: fs.file-max: 811729 -> 811798 * Changed: net.ipv6.conf.docker0.mtu: 1500 -> 1460
